de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.tools

Class TextFileTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.tools.TextFileTools

  • public class TextFileTools
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements basic operations on text based measurement and coordinate files.

    Therefore a couple of methods and helpers are implemented to do the conversions and operations on the given text files.

    Since:
    1
    Version:
    2
    Author:
    sebastian

    • Field Detail

      • arrayList

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> arrayList
        Member that stores the read lines. The lines are stored as String in an ArrayList<String>.

      • foundCodes

        private java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.Integer> foundCodes
        Member that stores the found codes. This is necessary, because of the code is eliminated from the string line.

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> readCSVLines

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextFileTools

        public TextFileTools(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> arrayList)
        Class Constructor with parameter.

        As parameter the ArrayList<String> object with the lines in text format is used.

        Parameters:
        arrayList - ArrayList<String> with lines in text format

      • TextFileTools

        As parameter the List<String[]> object with the lines in csv format is used.

    • Method Detail

      • getFoundCodes

        public java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.Integer> getFoundCodes()
        Returns the found codes as an integer array.

        This is necessary because of the elimination of the code in the string line.

        Returns:
        found codes as TreeSet<Integer>

      • processCodeSplit

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> processCodeSplit(boolean dropCode)
        Splits a code based file into separate files by code.

        A separate file is generated for every existing code. Lines without code will ignored. RyCON need a text file format that is nr, code, x, y, z and divided by blank or tab.

        Parameters:
        dropCode - if code column should dropped out of the result
        Returns:
        converted ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> for writing

      • processFormatConversionCSVBaselStadt2TXT

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> processFormatConversionCSVBaselStadt2TXT(java.lang.String separator)
        Converts a CSV file from the geodata server Basel Stadt (switzerland) into a txt format file.

        With a parameter it is possible to distinguish between space or tabulator as separator.

        Parameters:
        separator - separator sign as String
        Returns:
        converted ArrayList<String> with lines of text format

      • processConversionCSV2TXT

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> processConversionCSV2TXT(java.lang.String separator)
        Converts a CSV file into a TXT file with the given separator sign.
        Parameters:
        separator - separator sign to use for conversion
        Returns:
        converted TXT file

      • processConversionTXT2CSV

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> processConversionTXT2CSV(java.lang.String separator)
        Converts a TXT file into a CSV file with the given separator sign.
        Parameters:
        separator - separator sign to use for conversion
        Returns:
        converted CSV file
